dcterms:description: The StarCraft Multi-agent Challenge (SMAC) is an open-source platform designed for multi-agent reinforcement learning research, providing a variety of scenarios and challenges for agents to learn and compete in.
dcterms:title: StarCraft Multi-agent Challenge (SMAC)

dcterms:creator: F. A. Oliehoek
C. A. Amato
dcterms:description: Dec-POMDP is a framework for modeling decentralized partially observable Markov decision processes, which is used to analyze multi-agent systems where agents have limited information about the environment.
dcterms:title: Dec-POMDP

dcterms:creator: M. Samvelyan
T. Rashid
C. S. de Witt
G. Farquhar
N. Nardelli
T. G. J. Rudner
C. Hung
P. H. S. Torr
J. N. Foerster
S. Whiteson
dcterms:description: The PyMARL framework is a library for multi-agent reinforcement learning that provides implementations of various algorithms and environments, facilitating research in this area.
dcterms:title: PyMARL framework

dcterms:description: The predator-prey task is a multi-agent environment where agents (predators) must coordinate to capture prey, emphasizing exploration and collaboration among agents.
dcterms:title: Predator-prey task
